other_tests.findings: T2 hyperintensity surrounding the head of the pancreas consistent with edema, surrounding fat stranding, compressed pancreatic duct within the head, multiple subcentimeter pancreatic cystic lesions, mildly enlarged lymph node superior to pancreatic neck, multiple T2 hyperintense cystic lesions within the liver, right adrenal adenoma unchanged since previous CT.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The right adrenal adenoma is unchanged since the previous CT.
